1.0.name: wordpress/doctor-house-quotes
1.0.description:
Description: This is just a plugin that quotes some lines used by Doctor House in House MD tv show. This plugin is based on Hello Dolly and i hope in time it will do more than just quote some lines.

For more information please read the article about this plugin from my blog: http://ejohnny.net/blog/2010/doctor-house-quotes-wordpress-plugin.html
